meanings.definition: To drink more alcohol than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outdrinks her friends at parties.
meanings.sent2: He outdrinks everyone at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse outdrinks the big cat in the cartoon.
meanings.sent4: In the competition, he outdrinks his opponents effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The champion outdrinks all challengers with ease.

meanings.sent1: My uncle outdrinks all his buddies during poker nights.
meanings.sent2: During the contest, she outdrinks her competitors.
meanings.sent3: The superhero outdrinks the villains in the movie.
meanings.sent4: He outdrinks his own record from last year.
meanings.sent5: The team captain outdrinks the rest of the players after the game.
